patthana17.12:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana17.12:1.1_1: adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana17.12:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana17.12:3.1_0: Kusalaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana17.12:3.1_1: adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
